channel.title: Comic-Con 2025 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Comic-Con 2025 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Rick and Morty’ Creator Dan Harmon on Season 8 Tinkering and Fans Pushing for More From the Multiverse
item.description: Harmon tells The Hollywood Reporter that he has already written season 10 episodes, which he jokes has led to confusion for him about when everything is airing: “I’ve become my own Chevy Chase.”

item.title: ‘Rick and Morty’ Creator Dan Harmon on Season 8 Tinkering and Fans Pushing for More From the Multiverse
item.description: Harmon tells The Hollywood Reporter that he has already written season 10 episodes, which he jokes has led to confusion for him about when everything is airing: “I’ve become my own Chevy Chase.”

item.title: George Lucas Makes Comic-Con Debut, Unveils First Look at His “Temple to the People’s Art” Museum
item.description: Lucas was joined on stage by Guillermo del Toro and production designer Doug Chiang, with all three bolstering the case on how narrative art, which includes comic book art, needs to be uplifted and ce

item.description: Lucas was joined on stage by Guillermo del Toro and production designer Doug Chiang, with all three bolstering the case on how narrative art, which includes comic book art, needs to be uplifted and ce

item.title: Rebecca Romijn Isn’t “Sure” She’s Done Filming for ‘Avengers: Doomsday’ Because “They Haven’t Finishing Writing” the Script
item.description: Romijn is set to reprise her role as Mystique, a character she originated in 2000’s ‘X-Men.’

item.title: Rebecca Romijn Isn’t “Sure” She’s Done Filming for ‘Avengers: Doomsday’ Because “They Haven’t Finishing Writing” the Script
item.description: Romijn is set to reprise her role as Mystique, a character she originated in 2000’s ‘X-Men.’

item.title: ‘Interview With the Vampire’ Takes on New Title for Season 3: ‘The Vampire Lestat’
item.description: The change reflects the AMC show’s move to focus on the second book in Anne Rice’s Vampire Chronicles series.

item.title: ‘Interview With the Vampire’ Takes on New Title for Season 3: ‘The Vampire Lestat’
item.description: The change reflects the AMC show’s move to focus on the second book in Anne Rice’s Vampire Chronicles series.

item.title: Starz Unleashes ‘Spartacus: House of Ashur’ Trailer
item.description: Yes, it’s bloody.

item.title: Starz Unleashes ‘Spartacus: House of Ashur’ Trailer
item.description: Yes, it’s bloody.

item.title: ‘Star Trek: Strange New Worlds’ Delights Comic-Con With Upcoming Episode, Teases All-Puppet Installment
item.description: “We think of you all the time when we are in the writers room and we always talk about what would the fans want and love,” exec producer Akiva Goldsman told supporters in Hall H.

item.title: ‘Star Trek: Strange New Worlds’ Delights Comic-Con With Upcoming Episode, Teases All-Puppet Installment
item.description: “We think of you all the time when we are in the writers room and we always talk about what would the fans want and love,” exec producer Akiva Goldsman told supporters in Hall H.

item.title: Ryan Gosling Debuts New ‘Project Hail Mary’ Footage to Laughs at Comic-Con
item.description: Phil Lord and Christopher Miller helmed the Amazon MGM Studios sci-fi feature that hits theaters next year.

item.title: Ryan Gosling Debuts New ‘Project Hail Mary’ Footage to Laughs at Comic-Con
item.description: Phil Lord and Christopher Miller helmed the Amazon MGM Studios sci-fi feature that hits theaters next year.

item.title: ‘Resident Alien’ Team Responds to Cancellation: “I Wasn’t Ready”
item.description: Currently airing its fourth season, the sci-fi series’ creatives tell The Hollywood Reporter how it feels to have the show come to an end next month.

item.title: ‘Resident Alien’ Team Responds to Cancellation: “I Wasn’t Ready”
item.description: Currently airing its fourth season, the sci-fi series’ creatives tell The Hollywood Reporter how it feels to have the show come to an end next month.

item.title: ‘Family Guy’ Books Second Set of Halloween, Holiday Specials at Hulu
item.description: The two streaming-exclusive episodes will premiere ahead of the show’s 24th season on Fox.

item.title: ‘Coyote vs. Acme’ Debuts First Footage as Will Forte Reflects on Salvaged Film: “I Had Given Up Hope”
item.description: During its Comic-Con panel, the movie’s team celebrated the Looney Tunes feature finally getting a release date after it was scrapped by Warner Bros.

item.title: ‘Coyote vs. Acme’ Debuts First Footage as Will Forte Reflects on Salvaged Film: “I Had Given Up Hope”
item.description: During its Comic-Con panel, the movie’s team celebrated the Looney Tunes feature finally getting a release date after it was scrapped by Warner Bros.

item.title: “James Fraser Dies” in First ‘Outlander’ Season 8 Footage
item.description: Well, that’s one way to end the series.

item.title: “James Fraser Dies” in First ‘Outlander’ Season 8 Footage
item.description: Well, that’s one way to end the series.

item.title: ‘South Park’ Creators Reveal Network Battle Over Premiere’s Trump Penis as They Joke: “We’re Terribly Sorry”
item.description: Their Comic-Con panel took place the day after the controversial ‘South Park’ season 27 premiere earned the ire of President Donald Trump and showed a version of him lying naked in bed with Satan.

item.title: ‘South Park’ Creators Reveal Network Battle Over Premiere’s Trump Penis as They Joke: “We’re Terribly Sorry”
item.description: Their Comic-Con panel took place the day after the controversial ‘South Park’ season 27 premiere earned the ire of President Donald Trump and showed a version of him lying naked in bed with Satan.

item.description: The official clip debuted during a panel at San Diego Comic-Con.

item.description: The Disney+ show also released a teaser for the coming season at Comic-Con.

item.title: From ‘South Park’ to George Lucas’ First Comic-Con: Inside the Most Anticipated Panels
item.description: No Marvel? No problem. Here are the Hall H offerings most likely to bring a jolt to San Diego this year.
